titleStmt.title: Sadlers new Tunbridge Wells near Islington. A full account how they were found out: the excellent medicinal vertues of the water, and success in several diseases: the manner of its working, and directions for the taking it.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for B. Harris at the Royal-Exchange in Cornhill.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
